select count(*) from ( select b.bm_innb from tb_bbs_manage b, tb_empl_manage e
where b.delete_at = 'N' and b.bm_code = '1' and b.regist_man = e.em_no
and b.cm_code = #{params.cm_code}
and ( b.regist_man = #{params.em_no} OR /*지점*/ b.bm_innb in (select c.bm_innb from tb_bbs_target c, tb_empl_manage d where c.bm_innb = b.bm_innb and c.om_code = d.bhf_code and d.em_no != 'superuser' and d.use_at = 'Y' and d.delete_at = 'N' and d.em_no = #{params.em_no}) or /*매장*/ b.bm_innb in (select c.bm_innb from tb_bbs_target c, tb_empl_manage d, tb_str_manage e where c.bm_innb = b.bm_innb and c.sm_code = e.sm_code and d.em_no != 'superuser' and d.use_at = 'Y' and d.delete_at = 'N' and e.use_at = 'Y' and e.delete_at = 'N' and d.bhf_code = e.om_code and d.em_no = #{params.em_no}) or /* 171020 kmh */ b.bm_innb in (select c.bm_innb from tb_bbs_receiver_target c, tb_empl_manage d where c.bm_innb = b.bm_innb and ( c.om_code = d.bhf_code or (c.brt_flag = 'or' and c.brt_code = d.cm_code) or (c.brt_flag = 'em' and c.brt_code = #{params.em_no}) or (c.brt_flag = 'tm' and c.brt_code = d.team_code) ) and d.use_at = 'Y' and d.delete_at = 'N' and d.em_no != 'superuser' and d.em_no = #{params.em_no}) )
and ( /*지점*/ b.bm_innb in (select c.bm_innb from tb_bbs_target c, tb_empl_manage d where c.bm_innb = b.bm_innb and c.om_code = d.bhf_code and d.em_no != 'superuser' and d.use_at = 'Y' and d.delete_at = 'N' and d.em_no = #{params.em_no}) or /*매장*/ b.bm_innb in (select c.bm_innb from tb_bbs_target c, tb_empl_manage d, tb_str_empl e where c.bm_innb = b.bm_innb and c.sm_code = e.sm_code and d.em_no != 'superuser' and d.use_at = 'Y' and d.delete_at = 'N' and e.delete_at = 'N' and e.em_no is not null and d.em_no = e.em_no and d.em_no = #{params.em_no}) or /* 171020 kmh */ b.bm_innb in (select c.bm_innb from tb_bbs_receiver_target c, tb_empl_manage e left join tb_str_empl s on s.em_no is not null and s.em_no = e.em_no left join v_store_list d on d.sm_code = s.sm_code where c.bm_innb = b.bm_innb and c.fix_round != '0000000008'
and c.fix_round != '0000000007'
and c.fix_round != '0000000006'
and e.delete_at = 'N' and e.em_no != 'superuser' and e.em_no = #{params.em_no} and ( (c.brt_flag = 'or' and c.brt_code = e.cm_code) or (
(c.brt_flag = 'om' and c.brt_code = e.bhf_code) or (c.brt_flag = 'tm' and c.brt_code = e.team_code) or (c.brt_flag = 'em' and c.brt_code = e.em_no) or (c.brt_flag = 'st' and c.brt_code = d.om_code) or (c.brt_flag = 'cg' and c.brt_code = d.cg_code) or (c.brt_flag = 'me' and c.brt_code = d.me_code and c.cg_code = d.cg_code) or (c.brt_flag = 'sm' and c.brt_code = d.sm_code)
) )) )
AND (b.fixrnd <> '0000000007' OR b.fixrnd IS NULL)
AND (b.fixrnd <> '0000000006' OR b.fixrnd IS NULL)
and ( b.bm_innb in (select p.bm_innb from tb_bbs_target p where b.bm_innb = p.bm_innb) or b.bm_innb in (select r.bm_innb from tb_bbs_receiver_target r where b.bm_innb = r.bm_innb) )
and b.bm_innb in ( select c.bm_innb from tb_bbs_target c where c.bm_innb = b.bm_innb and c.tm_code = #{params.teamWord} union select c.bm_innb from tb_bbs_receiver_target c where c.bm_innb = b.bm_innb and ( (c.brt_flag = 'tm' and c.brt_code = #{params.teamWord}) or ( c.brt_flag = 'em' and (select team_code from tb_empl_manage where em_no = c.brt_code) = #{params.teamWord}) ) )
and bm_sj like '%${params.word}%'
and bm_cn like '%${params.word}%'
and b.regist_de between str_to_date(replace(concat(#{params.search_date_from},'000000'), '-', ''),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') and str_to_date(replace(concat(#{params.search_date_to},'235959'), '-', ''),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
and b.regist_de >= DATE_ADD(date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL - 1 month)
group by b.bm_innb, b.regist_de ) as aa where 1=1
and aa.bm_innb in ( select bm_innb from tb_bbs_target c where c.bm_innb = aa.bm_innb and c.om_code = #{params.jijumOmCode}
union select bm_innb from tb_bbs_receiver_target c where c.bm_innb = aa.bm_innb and ( c.brt_flag = 'or' or (c.brt_flag = 'om' and c.brt_code=#{params.jijumOmCode}) or (c.brt_flag = 'tm' and c.brt_code IN (select om_code from tb_orgnzt_manage where om_parent_no = #{params.jijumOmCode}) ) or ( c.brt_flag = 'em' and (select bhf_code from tb_empl_manage where em_no = c.brt_code) = #{params.jijumOmCode}) ) )
and aa.bm_innb in ( select c.bm_innb from tb_bbs_target c ,tb_str_manage s where c.bm_innb = aa.bm_innb and c.sm_code = s.sm_code and s.sm_nm like '%${params.jijumWord}%' )
and ( aa.bm_innb in (select bm_innb from tb_bbs_target c where c.bm_innb = aa.bm_innb and c.om_code = #{params.jijumOmCode} ) and aa.bm_innb in ( select c.bm_innb from tb_bbs_target c ,tb_str_manage s where c.bm_innb = aa.bm_innb and c.sm_code = s.sm_code and s.sm_nm like '%${params.jijumWord}%' ) )
